title: The Last Trendation of Geist 4/22: CHCA, Dustin Milligan, Earth Day, OJ, Joel Embiid
itunes:title: The Last Trendation of Geist 4/22: CHCA, Dustin Milligan, Earth Day, OJ, Joel Embiid
description:
On this edition of The Last Trendation of Geist Jack and Miles discuss the Covid-19 Hate Crimes Act, Dustin Milligan being sweaty, today being Earth Day, OJ's Chauvin Trial Twitter take, and Joel Embiid's buzzer beater attempt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
